name: custom-plugin-flutter
description: Industrial-grade Flutter development plugin with 7 specialized agents covering UI, state management, backend integration, database design, performance optimization, testing, and DevOps. Production-ready code examples, 25+ projects, 10,500+ lines of expert content.
author: Custom Plugin Development Team

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-ui
agents.description: Deep expertise in Flutter widget systems, constraint-based layouts, Material Design, Cupertino design, custom widget composition, animation frameworks, and responsive design patterns for cross-platform excellence.

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-state-management
agents.description: Master all state management patterns: setState, Provider, Riverpod, BLoC, GetX. Deep expertise in dependency injection, state persistence, serialization, and scalable architecture patterns for enterprise applications.

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-backend
agents.description: Complete backend integration mastery: HTTP clients (http, Dio, Chopper), REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, JWT authentication, Firebase integration, error handling, real-time data synchronization, and API architecture patterns.

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-database
agents.description: Expert-level database architecture: SharedPreferences, Hive, SQLite, ObjectBox, Firestore, Realtime Database. Schema design, migrations, encryption, offline-first patterns, conflict resolution, and intelligent sync strategies.

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-performance
agents.description: Deep performance engineering: build optimization, 60+ FPS rendering, memory profiling, asset optimization, code splitting, image handling, network efficiency, battery optimization, APK/IPA size reduction, and production monitoring.

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-testing
agents.description: Comprehensive testing mastery: unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, E2E testing, test coverage metrics, mocking strategies, CI/CD integration, performance testing, accessibility testing, and quality gates.

agents.name: custom-plugin-flutter-devops
agents.description: Production deployment expertise: iOS/Android build systems, code signing, App Store/Google Play submission, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Fastlane), release management, beta testing, crash reporting, and production monitoring.

commands.name: custom-plugin-flutter-learn
commands.description: Structured learning paths - Beginner (0-6mo), Intermediate (6-12mo), Advanced (12+mo) with clear progression and skill milestones

commands.name: custom-plugin-flutter-agents
commands.description: Explore all 7 specialized agents with detailed capabilities, expertise areas, and integration patterns

commands.name: custom-plugin-flutter-assess
commands.description: Self-assessment tool - 50+ questions across 7 Flutter development domains to evaluate knowledge level and identify growth areas

commands.name: custom-plugin-flutter-projects
commands.description: 25+ hands-on project ideas from beginner to advanced - TodoApp, ChatApp, E-commerce, Marketplace, ML integration, and enterprise applications

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui
skills.description: 1700+ lines of Flutter UI mastery - widgets, layouts, Material Design, animations, responsive design with production-ready code examples

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state
skills.description: 2300+ lines of state management expertise - all patterns with code examples, testing strategies, and architecture patterns

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend
skills.description: 1500+ lines of backend integration - REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, Firebase, authentication, serialization, and error handling

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database
skills.description: 1800+ lines of database architecture - all storage solutions, schema design, encryption, offline-first, sync strategies

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance
skills.description: 1600+ lines of performance optimization - profiling, memory management, rendering, size reduction, battery efficiency

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing
skills.description: 1600+ lines of testing mastery - all test types, mocking, CI/CD integration, coverage metrics, accessibility testing

skills.name: custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops
skills.description: 1800+ lines of DevOps expertise - CI/CD pipelines, code signing, app store submission, monitoring, automation
